list.name: Default
list.comment: Major cleanup. Transparent cursor, and more intuitive animation for AI.

task.summary: Default task
Bare bones. Bug with for in range (empty)
Bare bones. Bug with for in range (empty)
Bare bones. Bug with for in range (empty)
Almost fully functional Game.py. Doesn't detect draw yet. No AI either
Added scoring. Fixed bug when player gets close to edge of board.
Added highlighting of possible moves. Bug remains when board is full but last player didn't win.
Improved colours. Simplified characters (less conditional)
Improved colours. Simplified characters (less conditional)
Slightly improved game end detection. Needs to check for case when no moves are possible
Added .gameExtents (not yet implemented) and optimized direction scanning (.getDirections)
Added GameMove and implemented GameBoard.assessBoard
Added rudimentary AIPlayer, no real intelligence as yet.
getFlipCount => assessRow now returns overturned list rather than an int Yet to implement.
Implemented GameMove.Overturned
Added more comprehensive AI
Added more comprehensive AI. Bug remains: When game runs out of moves => crash. I.e. winner/draw detection is lacking somewhat
Fixed bug: When game runs out of moves => crash. I.e. winner/draw detection fixed
AI: Added logic to check for unprotected corners before taking inner corners
AI: Added randomness when multiple moves with same score exist.
Added pygame UI, really not finished yet!
Added pygame UI, really not finished yet!
Improved messages (slightly!)
Implemented TextOverlay class. Not fully implemented however.
Implemented better graphics (not animated yet)
Better handling of multiple text_overlays. Stacked animation
Better handling of multiple text_overlays. Stacked animation
Fixed graphics.ask method. Alpha fade animation for text_overlays
Fixed graphics.ask method. Alpha fade animation for text_overlays
Implemented Player base class to AIPlayer and HumanPlayer
Further refactoring of players (base class)
Play "Another game?"
Fixed issue where AI vs AI did not update screen.
Implemented graphical ScoreOverlay at Thomas' request
Added show_winner method to ScoreOverlay()
Fixed bug in game rules such that if one player can't move, but the other still can, the game continues (rather than finishing).
Fully implemented Animation class.
Looking good!
More work on animation.
AIPlayer graphics optimisation, and minor improvements to location scoring (is_edge_of_corner)
AIPlayer graphics optimisation, and minor improvements to location scoring (is_edge_of_corner)
Minor UI tweaks. Tried optimizing get_location_score, but tests revealed no improvement in CPU cycles.
Minor UI tweaks. Tried optimizing get_location_score, but tests revealed no improvement in CPU cycles.
Minor UI tweaks. Tried optimizing get_location_score, but tests revealed no improvement in CPU cycles.
Major cleanup. Transparent cursor, and more intuitive animation for AI.
Refactored further favouring Tuples for storage of move location
